mapper.select: SELECT r.sales_rt_date sales_rt_date , p.prod_name prod_name , a.act_name act_name , o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt , r.sales_rt_amt sales_rt_amt , (o.sales_out_amt - r.sales_rt_amt) as total , r.sales_rt_code sales_rt_code , r.prod_lot prod_lot , r.sales_out_code sales_out_code , r.sales_rt_amt sales_rt_amt , r.sales_rt_date sales_rt_date , r.sales_rt_why sales_rt_why , r.emp_code emp_code , r.prod_code prod_code , o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt FROM sales_rt r JOIN com_prod p ON (r.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN sales_out o ON (r.sales_out_code = o.sales_out_code) JOIN com_act a ON ( o.act_code = a.act_code) ORDER BY sales_rt_code
SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code DESC

SELECT r.sales_rt_code , r.prod_lot , r.prod_code , r.sales_out_code , r.sales_rt_amt , o.sales_out_amt , (o.sales_out_amt - r.sales_rt_amt) as total , r.sales_rt_date , r.sales_rt_why , r.emp_code , e.emp_name FROM sales_rt r JOIN sales_out o ON (r.prod_lot = o.prod_lot) JOIN com_emp e ON (r.emp_code = e.emp_code) ORDER BY sales_rt_code
SELECT o.*, d.dev_yn FROM sales_out o JOIN sales_ord_de d ON (o.sales_ord_de_code = d.sales_ord_de_code) WHERE d.dev_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY sales_out_code

SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod
WHERE prod_name LIKE '%' || #{prodName} || '%'
AND prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code

SELECT o.sales_out_code sales_out_code , p.prod_name prod_name , o.prod_code prod_code , o.prod_lot prod_lot , o.act_code act_code , o.emp_code emp_code , e.emp_name emp_name , a.act_name act_name , o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt , o.sales_out_date sales_out_date , i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd , o.sales_ord_de_code sales_ord_de_code , i.prod_save_amt prod_save_amt FROM sales_out o JOIN com_prod p ON (o.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code) JOIN sales_in i ON (o.prod_code = i.prod_code) JOIN sales_ord_de d ON (o.sales_ord_de_code = d.sales_ord_de_code) JOIN com_emp e ON (o.emp_code = e.emp_code)
WHERE prod_name LIKE '%' || #{prodName} || '%'
ORDER BY sales_out_code DESC
